name: 2muse
tag_list: china, digital-music, background-music, legally-compliant, digital-media, media-solutions, shanghai, dfr-asia
overview:
2muse provides customized, fully legal music programming for stores and businesses throughout China.

The 2muse solution integrates high-quality music programming, digital delivery, and back-end royalty accounting into a cost efficient and easy to use system.

Support from Chinese government and professional trade associations give 2muse an edge in providing its fully licensed and high-quality service nationwide.

2muse’s work and development are supported by the General Administration of Press and Publication (GAPP), the China Audio & Video Association (CAVA), the Shanghai Municipal Party Publicity Department under the new Shanghai Synergy Culture & Entertainment Group (SSCEG), DFR Asia, and the Chinese government’s intellectual property protection goals set forth in the “Twelfth Five Year Guideline”.
